original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ āsandim pi pallaṅkam pi paribhuñjanti

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ āsandim pi pallaṅkam pi paribhuñjissanti seyyathā api gihiniyaḥ kāmabhoginiyaḥ ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ āsandim pi pallaṅkam pi paribhuñjissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ āsandim pi pallaṅkam pi paribhuñjanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo āsandimpi pallaṅkampi paribhuñjissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ āsandim pi pallaṅkam pi paribhuñjissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī āsandiṁ vā pallaṅkaṁ vā paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī āsandim vā pallaṅkam vā paribhuñjeyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: tasmiṁ abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: tasmin abhinisīdati vā abhinipajjati vā āpatti pācittiyassa
